title: Little athletics: hurdling
creator_credit: Tony Blane, Australian Little Athletics Union and Shell Company of Australia
brief_description: The stages of learning to hurdle are explained and demonstrated. Specific exercises for hurdlers are shown along with more general exercises from which all young athletes could benefit. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Tony Blane, Australian Little Athletics Union and Shell Company of Australia
